It can either prepared with basil or peas as base Ingredient & also you can replace green chilly with jalape√±os or cayenne pepper. Guacamole can be used as dip or spread or in salad. Procedure :
  • Toast bread in toaster
  • or you can also toast bread on tawa by smearing butter or oil as you prefer
  • When bread turns golden brown, Take out them
  • Take a plate & place toasted bread slices
  • Apply guacamole on each bread slices
  • Serve immediately
  • Happy cooking & Enjoy your day

  • When the guacamole is exposure to air slowly it turns to brown color. To avoid this store guacamole in an airtight container or cover it with clear plastic wrap
